hero.title: EXCLUSIVE PLAST
hero.subtitle: High-quality plastic products manufacturer
hero.description: We fully satisfy customer needs with modern technologies and a professional team

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: On the path of quality and innovation
about.historyText1: Exclusive Invest Industry was founded in 2006 and is currently one of the leading manufacturers of plastic products in Uzbekistan under the brand “Exclusive Plast”. Since 2024, the company has also established GL Clean, launching the production of five types of vacuum cleaners under the MAGNA brand.
about.historyText2: Thanks to direct manufacturing, we offer our products at prices lower than the market rate, while this has absolutely no impact on their quality. All products are certified by the O‘Zstandart quality system and fully comply with international standards.
about.historyText3: “Exclusive Plast” and GL Clean are among the leading manufacturers in Uzbekistan and the CIS countries. The company has nearly 10,000 square meters of production space and produces over 200 types of plastic products. Its annual production capacity is 5 000 tons of plastic and 300,000 vacuum cleaners. Currently, more than 150 skilled employees work at the enterprise.
about.historyText4: Today, the companies regularly supply their products to CIS countries under export contracts concluded with several states.
about.qualityDesc: High quality is our main principle

home.aboutTitle: EXCLUSIVE PLAST - Guarantee of quality and trust
home.aboutDesc: We have been operating in the plastic products manufacturing sector since 2005. We are one of the leading companies in Uzbekistan and the CIS countries.
home.productsDesc: We produce more than 30 types of products and manufacture custom orders on request
home.certificatesDesc: All products are certified by Uzstandard authorities and comply with international standards
home.contactDesc: If you have questions or proposals, get in touch with us
home.name: Your name
home.advantageDesc1: We manufacture over 200 types of plastic products
home.advantageDesc2: Modern equipment and quality control system

services.title: Services

services.customProduction: TPA 90 / 120 / 230 - For small and micro parts
services.customProductionDesc: Individual product manufacturing according to customer requirements. We handle orders of any complexity using modern technologies.
services.customProductionDesc2: We provide delivery across Uzbekistan and organize exports through our logistics system.
services.customProductionDesc3: Our specialists will help you choose the most suitable product and answer all your technical questions.
services.qualityControlDesc: All products undergo strict quality control during the production process and meet international standards.
services.equipmentDesc: We use the latest technologies and high-quality equipment
services.uskuna2: Our facility is equipped with the most modern machines. This enables us to produce high-quality products quickly and efficiently.
services.uskuna3: All equipment is regularly maintained and upgraded, ensuring uninterrupted production.

apparations_words.name: Equipment name
apparations_words.model1: TPA 90 / 120 / 230 - For small and micro parts

magna.magnaCompany: The story of our manufacturing company, Trinity Technology Ltd., began in 2018, when the owners made an important decision to open a new direction in the field of manufacturing. Despite being a relatively young company, we are part of a professional team distributing household appliances that has been active in the Central Asian markets for over 25 years. Thanks to this experience, from the very first days of our establishment, we were able to position ourselves as a modern, innovative, and technologically advanced enterprise producing products highly appreciated by tens of thousands of satisfied customers both in the Republic of Uzbekistan and abroad.
